King Krause (German: König Krause) is a 1919 German silent comedy film directed by Heinrich Bolten-Baeckers.
Cast
In alphabetical order
* Conrad Dreher
* Lilly Flohr
* Sabine Impekoven
* Fritz Lion
* Richard Ludwig
* Annemarie Mörike
* Melita Petri
* Leo Peukert
* Hans Stock
References
Bibliography
* Michael Töteberg. Das Ufa-Buch. Zweitausendeins, 1992.
